remarks: Scalar multiplication on a subspace is a restriction of scalar multiplication on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ssps.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
ssps.s $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
ssps.r $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
ssps.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
ssps $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> R = ( S |` ( CC X. Y ) ) ) $.
